message.content:
I need to identify the cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets in this cash flow statement.

Looking at the Investing Activities section of the cash flow statement, I can see the line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 2,265,288.42. This represents the cash payments made to acquire property, plant and equipment (fixed assets).

This is the only line item in the investing activities section that relates to acquisition of long-term assets.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2265288.42'}}
```
